gallery_extensionfactory_promo.description: Check out our other great extensions and web apps at http://www.extensionfactory.com
gallery_extensionfactory_promo.message: Pogledajte ostale naše odlične dodatke i web aplikacije na http://www.extensionfactory.com

gallery_features_search_for_places.description: - Search by city or zip code
gallery_features_search_for_places.message: - Pretraga po gradu ili poštanskom broju

gallery_help_us.description: Help us to make this application better!
gallery_help_us.message: Pomozite nam napraviti ovu aplikaciju boljom!

gallery_help_us_comments.description: - we're happy to read and reply to your comments as well.
gallery_help_us_comments.message: - zadovoljstvo nam je pročitati i odgovoriti na vaše komentare također.

gallery_help_us_stars.description: - if you like this product, please give it stars :)
gallery_help_us_stars.message: - ukoliko vam se ovaj proizvod sviđa, molimo dajte mu zvjezdice :)

gallery_privacy_browsing_history.description: - we do NOT store your browsing history! Although access to the chrome.tabs API is required, the application will never look or save your history. Please read http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html#warnings for more information.
gallery_privacy_browsing_history.message: - Mi ne pohranjujemo vaše povijesti pregledavanja! Iako je pristup chrome.tabs API potreban, aplikacija nikada neće gledati ili spremiti vašu povijest. Molimo Vas pročitajte http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html # warnings za više informacija.

gallery_privacy_personal_data.description: - we do NOT send any data to any third party servers.
gallery_privacy_personal_data.message: - mi NE šaljemo nikakve podatke bilo kojim serverima treće strane.

gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.description: - Instant geolocation and localization: get forecasts in your language
gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.message: - Instant Geolokacija i lokalizacija: dobijte prognoze na hrvatskom jeziku

gallery_weather_app_features_manage_favo.description: - Quick access to your favorite places

gallery_weather_app_features_notificatio.description: - Real time notifications on weather changes
gallery_weather_app_features_notificatio.message: - Obavijesti u realnom vremenu o vremenskim promjenama

search_city_input_placeholder.description: Enter a city or zip code (default text in the search box)

weather_app_description.description: This application geolocates you and displays in one click your favorite location weather forecasts.
weather_app_description.message: Ova aplikacija vas geolocira i prikazuje jednim klikom vaše omiljene lokacije vremenske prognoze.

weather_gallery_description.message: Dodatak Vreme automatski će Vas geografski smjestiti i prikazati prognozu vremena najbližeg grada. Ikonica preglednika prikazuje dnevnu prognozu i temperaturu.

weather_notifications_forecast_label.description: display notification on weather forecast change (checkbox)
weather_notifications_forecast_label.message: prikaži obavijesti o promeni vremenske prognoze

weather_notifications_present_label.description: display notification on daily weather updates (checkbox)
weather_notifications_present_label.message: prikaži obavijesti o dnevnim ažuriranjima vremena

weather_present_updated_label.description: Weather of the day has been updated !
weather_present_updated_label.message: Vrijeme za ovaj dan je ažurirano !
